Title: Hope Eternal
Actors: Christine Rochat Genoud, Richard Harrington, Lusungu Munthali, Joanna Griffiths
Plot: After the violent death of her Welsh rugby-loving doctor boyfriend in the country's civil war, a Malagasy nurse working at a child hospice in Congo makes a pilgrimage to Wales to sprinkle his ashes on the turf of the Millennium Stadium.
